explains: abbr. 生物技术；生物科技（biotechnology）

sentences.en: Knowledge Ecology International contends that the Supreme Court's ruling could have "profound effects" on other biotech industries.
sentences.cn: 知识生态国际认为，最高法院的裁决可能对其他生物技术行业产生“深远影响”。

sentences.en: Opponents also question the safety of biotech foods.
sentences.cn: 反对者还质疑生物技术食品的安全性。

sentences.en: Cloned livestock are the next frontier in biotech farming.
sentences.cn: 克隆家畜成为生物技术农业下一个前沿。
